name: Oceanum Mortis
description:
A short turn based RPG with old school graphics similar to 90s PC games like Baldur's Gate. You play as a group of defender's looking into a disease that
started spreading in the forest, where you encounter someone strange that seems to be hunting you. The game is about 3 hours long and has over 40 maps.
There are four characters that can be in your group and each one has unique skills. Are you strong enough to pursue the evil that wants to consume you?

A few features of the game:

    Cool retro graphics

    A medieval fantasy setting

    Different character skills with impressive animations

    A soothing soundtrack
